pages.text: The $(item)Tartaric Aeroheater$() is the most powerful $(thing)Aeroheater$() there is, if you can afford to run it. It burns Furnace fuel alongside $(item)Tartaric Stoker$(), the latter lasting as long as 1 Coal. Fuels are burned faster and faster as it heats up, up to 25x normal burning speed.$(br2)Fuels can be inserted from any side except the top.
